That's a great attitude to have! Spinning can be a fantastic complement to your Zumba routine, and it's awesome that you're excited to challenge yourself.

Staying motivated and tracking progress are crucial to achieving your fitness goals. Here are some tips to help you stay motivated and track your progress in spinning class:

1. **Set specific goals**: Define what you want to achieve in spinning class, such as increasing your average RPM, completing a certain number of classes, or reaching a new personal best. Having specific goals will help you stay focused and motivated.
2. **Track your progress**: Use a fitness tracker, log your workouts, or take progress photos to monitor your improvement. Seeing your progress can be a great motivator!
3. **Find a spinning buddy**: Having a workout buddy can make the experience more enjoyable and help you stay accountable. Ask Emily to join you, or meet new people in class and make friends!
4. **Mix up your routine**: To avoid plateaus, try different spinning classes, instructors, or music genres. This will keep your workouts fresh and exciting.
5. **Celebrate small victories**: Acknowledge and celebrate your small achievements, like completing a tough class or increasing your endurance. This will help you stay motivated and encouraged.
6. **Reward yourself**: Treat yourself to something nice after reaching a milestone, like a new workout outfit or a post-workout smoothie.
7. **Focus on how you feel**: Remember that progress isn't just about numbers or metrics. Focus on how spinning makes you feel – more energized, confident, or empowered.
8. **Get feedback from instructors**: Ask your instructors for feedback on your form, technique, or progress. They can provide valuable insights to help you improve.
9. **Make it a habit**: Consistency is key. Try to schedule spinning classes into your routine, so it becomes a habit you enjoy.
10. **Have fun**: Most importantly, remember to have fun! Spinning is a great way to challenge yourself, but it's also meant to be enjoyable. Don't be too hard on yourself, and celebrate your progress along the way.

By following these tips, you'll be well on your way to staying motivated and tracking your progress in spinning class. Good luck, and have a blast!
